    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resource)
      Used when view is opened. Sets initial values and fields required for view operation.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resource - used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • handleRemovePizza

      protected void handleRemovePizza()
      Action handler for remove button. Allows user to remove pizzas from current order.

    • handlePlaceOrder

      protected void handlePlaceOrder()
      Action handler for place order button. Allows user to place their current order.

    • handleClearOrder

      protected void handleClearOrder()
      Action handler for clear order button. Allows user to clear all pizzas from their current order.
